feed.title: The Ingredients for a Great Recipe
feed.subtitle: This project explores the factors that contribute to highly rated recipes by analyzing a dataset of recipe features and user ratings. Using data-driven techniques, we identify the "ingredients" for a great recipe, uncovering patterns and relationships between recipe attributes and their success. From data cleaning and visualization to building predictive models, this website provides insights into how data science can help us understand what makes recipes stand out. Perfect for food enthusiasts and data lovers alike, this analysis serves up a unique blend of culinary and computational perspectives.
